TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DSAKeyValue extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

Docs.summary: Represents the private key of the element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class represents the `<KeyInfo>` element, which contains a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> public key.
Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> to identify the public key that corresponds to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> private key that was used to create the digital signature.
If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key pair is randomly generated.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class is used with XML signatures. For more information about the W3C specification, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class in XML encryption to create a detached signature.
[!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CPP/exampledetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CS/exampledetached.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/VB/exampledetached.vb#1)]
The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> class in XML encryption to create an envelope signature.
[!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CPP/exampleenvelope.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CS/exampleenvelope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/VB/exampleenvelope.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a new, randomly-generated public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When creating a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> key, this constructor uses the default implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> as defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.DSA key) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance of an implementation of the class that holds the public key.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified public key.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Returns the XML representation of a element.
Docs.returns: The XML representation of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this method to output XML for a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the key value represented by a object.
Docs.value: The public key represented by a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property represents the DSA key used to sign the XML.
